short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance YouTube with custom video speeds, distraction-free mode, and Shorts management. Boost productivity with smart controls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ClearView for YouTube: Enhance Your Viewing Experience 🚀🎥  

Take control of your YouTube experience with ClearView, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to optimize productivity, reduce distractions, and enhance accessibility. Whether you're learning, working, or simply enjoying your favorite content, ClearView offers unparalleled customization and smart features. ✨

🌟 Key Features  

1. Video Speed Control 🎮⏩
     - Adjust playback speed precisely (0.25x to 16x). ⚙️  
     - Customizable keyboard shortcuts for efficiency ⌨️.  
     - Speed persistence across videos for seamless playback 🔁.  

     Perfect For:  
      - Speeding up tutorials and lectures to save time ⏳.  
      - Slowing down for detailed analysis (e.g., sports, technical demos) 🕵️‍♂️⚡.  

2. Distraction-Free Interface 🎯🛑 
     - Hide unwanted elements: recommendations, comments, end screens, and more ❌.  
     - Toggle dark/light mode 🌗 or set custom background colors 🎨.  
     - Compact layouts for focused viewing and split-screen setups 🔍📐.  

    Ideal For:  
     - Staying focused during study sessions or work 📚🖥️.  
     - Creating a clean, distraction-free viewing environment 🧘‍♂️✨.  

 3. Shorts Management ⏱️📉
     - Set daily limits for Shorts to prevent overuse 🚫📱.  
     - Track viewing habits with usage stats 📊.  
     - Auto-block or redirect once time limits are reached 🔄.  

    Use Cases:  
      - Boost productivity by reducing procrastination 💪📈.  
      - Enable parental controls for children 👨‍👩‍👧🔒.  

4. Visual & Layout Customization 🎨🖍️
    - Customize text and background colors 🌈, font sizes 🖋️, and layout widths 📏.  
    - Control element spacing and toggle animations 🌀.  

   Benefits:  
     - Improve readability and accessibility 👓.  
     - Match YouTube to your personal style and monitor setup 🖥️.  

5. Productivity Features 🚀📂 
     - Fast, lightweight, and efficient ⚡.  
     - Smart settings with profile management 📋.  
     - Backup/restore configurations for seamless transitions 🔄💾.  

  💡Advanced Tips :
     - Use keyboard shortcuts (`D` to speed up, `A` to slow down) ⌨️.  
     - Save different profiles for study, work, or leisure modes 📑🛠️.  
     - Regularly review and adjust settings for optimal performance 🛠️🔧.  


📬 Feedback & Privacy :

  🌟 Your input drives new updates and improvements.
